app.name: All API Hub
app.description: Manage all AI proxy stations with one click

account.title: Account
account.refresh_failed: Refresh failed, please try again later

site_info.custom_check_in_url: Custom check-in URL, click to go: {{url}}
site_info.checked_in_today: Checked in today, click to view
site_info.not_checked_in_today: Not checked in today, click to go

siteInfo.cookieWarning: Cookie authentication uses your current login account, cannot be used for multiple accounts on the same site, do not use unless necessary

infoPanel.confirmAddInfo: Please confirm that the account information is correct before clicking the 'Confirm Add' button.
infoPanel.manualInfo: Manually fill in the account information. The account will be saved securely in local storage.
infoPanel.autoDetectInfo: Please log in to the target site first, the extension will automatically detect the site type and automatically get the access token.
infoPanel.editInfoDesc: After modifying the account information, the system will re-verify and get the latest balance data.
infoPanel.reDetectInfo: If the site information changes, it is recommended to click the 'Re-detect' button (you need to log in to the target site first by yourself)

form.exchangeRateDesc: Indicates how much RMB is needed to recharge 1 USD. The system will try to get it automatically, please fill in manually if not obtained
form.validRateError: Please enter a valid exchange rate (0.1 - 100)
form.checkInStatus: Check-in Status Detection (site must have check-in enabled)
form.customCheckInDesc: If set, automatic check-in status detection will be disabled. Used for sites with custom check-in endpoints.

hooks.startNewApiConfig: Starting automatic configuration to New API...

deleteDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteDialog.warning: You are about to delete account {{accountName}}. Please verify before confirming to delete this account.
deleteDialog.noResponse: Delete operation did not return successfully

settings.title: Basic Settings
settings.description: Manage the basic configuration options of the plugin

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.importDescription: Restore data from a backup file
importExport.pasteJsonData: Paste JSON data or import via the file selector above...
importExport.dataInvalid: Data format error, please check JSON format
importExport.exportDescription: Export data as a JSON file for backup
importExport.fullBackupDescription: Export all account data and user settings, recommended for full backup
importExport.accountDataDescription: Only export account information and related data
importExport.userSettingsDescription: Only export interface settings and preference configurations

keyManagement.title: Key Management
keyManagement.description: This page displays API key information for all accounts, including usage and expiration time. You can create new keys for specific accounts by clicking the 'Add Key' button in the upper right corner or the '+' button next to each key item. Please keep your API keys safe and avoid leaking them to others.
keyManagement.pleaseSelectFirst: Please select an account first to view key list
keyManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete key {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
keyManagement.deleteFailed: Failed to delete key, please try again later
keyManagement.warningText: • Please keep API keys safe and avoid leaking
keyManagement.modelSelectHint: Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple models, {{count}} selected
keyManagement.ipPlaceholder: Leave empty for no limit, separate multiple IPs with commas
keyManagement.ipExample: Example: 192.168.1.1,10.0.0.1 or use * for no limit
keyManagement.editModeNoChange: Cannot change account in edit mode
keyManagement.updateFailed: Failed to update key, please try again later
keyManagement.loadDataFailed: Failed to load data, please try again later
keyManagement.validExpiration: Expiration time must be greater than current time
keyManagement.validIp: Please enter valid IP addresses, separate multiple IPs with commas

modelList.title: Model List
modelList.description: View and manage available AI models
modelList.pleaseSelectFirst: Please select an account first to view model list
modelList.incompatibleDesc: The model data interface of the current site does not conform to the standard specification, possibly due to secondary development of the site. The extension cannot parse the model pricing information of this site for the time being.
modelList.goToSitePricing: Go to site to view pricing information
modelList.loadFailed: Failed to load model data, please try again later
modelList.formatNotStandard: The model data format of the current site does not meet the standard, please manually check the site pricing page
modelList.pricingDescription: Price information comes from the API interface provided by the site, and the actual cost is subject to the prices published by each site. The price of pay-per-use models is the cost per 1M tokens, and pay-per-call models display the cost per call.

theme.toggle: Theme toggle, current {{currentMode}} mode, click to switch to {{nextMode}} mode

firefox.popupLimitation: This feature cannot be used normally in the popup of Firefox browser. Please use the sidebar mode to add accounts.
firefox.sidebarInstruction: Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar, then select the 'Sidebar' option to open the sidebar mode.
